alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Erie; Huron; Lake; Lorain; Medina; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 1:31PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Huron, Erie, Medina, Cuyahoga, southwestern Lake, Summit and Lorain Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 131 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Lakeline to near Avon Lake to 6 miles east of Kelleys Island. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, heavy rainfall, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Akron, Lorain, Elyria, Medina, Willowick, Vermilion, Western Vermilion, Parma, Lakewood, Cuyahoga Falls, Euclid, Cleveland Heights, Strongsville, Brunswick, Westlake, North Royalton, North Ridgeville, Kent and Barberton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cuyahoga; Erie; Huron; Lake; Lorain; Medina; Summit
